Basaltic Ore.description: Raw planetary crust metals (iron, nickel, copper).

Ferrovite Alloy.description: Smelted composite metal — strong, cheap, abundant.

Crytallite.description: Metallic crystal lattice grown under pressure; high conductivity.

Neutron-Forged Plate.description: Hyper-dense metal alloy forged under intense neutron radiation; hard to machine

Gravitic Mesh.description: Forged from the remnants of a neutron star, and condensed into solid metal mesh; virtually indestructible. Metal infused with gravity-manipulative particles.

Singularium.description: Forged from the remnants of a black hole, and condensed into solid metal mesh. Synthetic matter built from spacetime filaments.

Hydrolyte.description: Water with a strange affinity for metals, making it useful for electrolysis.

Vaporite.description: Water vaporized at extreme temperatures, compressed into a solid form.

Aqueous Nitrate.description: Water with a strange affinity for metals, making it useful for electrolysis.

Aquiferite.description: Water with a strange affinity for metals, making it useful for electrolysis.

Aqueous Sulfate.description: Water with a strange affinity for metals, making it useful for electrolysis.

Void Water.description: Water from a higher dimension, frozen in the vacuum of space.

Organifera.description: Raw biological material: plants, microbes, proteins. Used for food, basic medicine, colonist upkeep.

Biopolymer.description: Refined organic chains; flexible and durable. Used in construction materials, clothing, organics industry.

Symbiotic Culture.description: Engineered organisms functioning collectively. Used in Terraforming aids, biotech components.

Neural Biomass.description: Wetware capable of data processing. Used in AI cores, biological ships, psionic tech.

Edenic Genome.description: Blueprint of perfected life; self-replicating. Used in Genetic terraforming, cloning.

Lifeflux Essence.description: Living energy form — part biomass, part psionic. Used in Ascension projects, god-like biology tech.

Volatite Gas.description: Common planetary atmosphere gases (methane, CO₂, nitrogen). Used in Fuel, chemical industry, early power.

Ion Vapor.description: Electrically charged gas mix. Used in Propulsion, power generation.
